mapper.select: SELECT id,settingName FROM t_systemparam where settingid = (select id FROM t_systemsetting WHERE coding=#{coding} AND delete_flag='否' AND state='启用')
SELECT id,name from t_thread where state='0'
SELECT startTower,endTower FROM t_thread WHERE id=#{id}
SELECT u.id,u.name,r.coding FROM t_user u LEFT JOIN t_user_role ur ON u.id=ur.userId left JOIN t_role r ON ur.roleId=r.id WHERE u.state='0' and r.coding=#{coding}
SELECT id FROM t_inspection WHERE taskId=#{id}
select id,coding,lineId,state from t_tower where coding BETWEEN (SELECT startTower FROM t_thread WHERE id=#{id}) and (SELECT endTower FROM t_thread WHERE id=#{id})
SELECT id,name as flawname FROM t_flaw WHERE state=0

SELECT count(1) from t_inspection i INNER JOIN t_task t ON i.taskId=t.id INNER JOIN t_thread th ON i.threadId=th.id INNER JOIN t_user u on t.createdBy=u.id INNER JOIN t_systemparam sy on t.state=sy.id WHERE t.type='巡检任务'
mapper.update: UPDATE t_task SET state=(SELECT id FROM t_systemparam where settingid = (select id FROM t_systemsetting WHERE coding=#{coding} AND delete_flag='否' AND state='启用') AND settingName=#{settingName}) WHERE id=#{taskId}
UPDATE t_task SET updatedBy=#{creater},updatedDate=NOW() WHERE id=#{taskId}
